message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.CR, cs.SY, cs.DS. 

The paper deals with error detection and correction in wireless communications, which is a common topic in the Information Theory (cs.IT) and Networking and Internet Architecture (cs.NI) sub-categories. The use of network coding also suggests a possible fit in the Cryptography and Security (cs.CR) sub-category. The proposed scheme involves segmenting packets and attaching CRC codes, which could be seen as a system design and control problem, fitting in the Systems and Control (cs.SY) sub-category. Finally, the extensive simulations mentioned in the abstract suggest a possible fit in the Data Structures and Algorithms (cs.DS) sub-category.
